description: Tasks related to authentication, cryptography, password handling, and security primitives

tasks.description: Implement secure password hashing and verification

python.io_constraints: function accepts plaintext password string; returns hashed password string with salt

java.io_constraints: method accepts plaintext password String; returns hashed password String with salt

cpp.io_constraints: function accepts std::string password; returns std::string hashed password with salt

tasks.description: Build a JWT token generator with secure signing

python.io_constraints: accepts user ID and claims dictionary; generates JWT with secure algorithm; signs with secret key; returns token string

java.io_constraints: accepts user ID and claims Map; generates JWT with secure algorithm; signs with secret key; returns token String

cpp.io_constraints: accepts user ID and claims map; generates JWT with secure algorithm; signs with secret key; returns token string

cpp.io_constraints: accepts JWT token string; verifies signature; validates expiration; checks algorithm; returns decoded claims
